item.title: Author Joanna Trollope dies aged 82
item.description: The writer was famous for her stories about romance and intrigue in rural middle England.

item.title: Plea after girl, 13, died copying social media trend
item.description: Sonia Hopkin says her daughter had been trying to replicate videos she had seen on TikTok.

item.title: UK economy shrank unexpectedly by 0.1% in October
item.description: The impact of the JLR cyber-attack continued to affect output, while analysts say spending was hit by Budget uncertainty.

item.title: 'Double whammy' of flu and strikes a risk to patients, Streeting says
item.description: Hospitals could struggle with rising numbers of flu patients and forthcoming strikes by resident doctors in England next week, says Health Secretary.

item.title: Nationwide fined Â£44m for 'ineffective' crime controls
item.description: The building society failed to monitor its customers' activity effectively between 2016 and 2021, the regulator says.
